page.title: 12Visitors Comments(continued)
page.content: "Much as we have loved touring Britain -we long for the outdoor experience to balance the cities,museums,cathedrals ..So that is why we sought out Lundy. It is everything we hoped for". American visitors {"...the sheep are enough company most {of the time." "It's sad the church is so unused and almost,one feels,unloved" { {"Lundy is unpredictable and this {aspect I like.You have to take it as {you find it-but it always gives you a {great deal and I've always left with a {sadness in my heart-it could just be {my last visit-who knows?" "So far we have seen birds we never dreampt would be here and are really excited about the rest of our stay.I'm sure we will be visiting Lundy many more times in the years ahead".{ {
